javadoc:
Defines a production of an "extended" grammar
@see AssemblyExtendedGrammar

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct an extended production based on the given ancestor

params.name: finalState
params.comment: the end state of the final symbol of the RHS

params.name: ancestor
params.comment: the original production from which this extended production is derived

methods.javadoc:
Get the final state of this production
@return the end state of the last symbol of the RHS
methods.name: getFinalState
methods.comment: Get the final state of this production

return.comment: the end state of the last symbol of the RHS

methods.javadoc:
Get the original production from which this production was derived
@return the original production
methods.name: getAncestor
methods.comment: Get the original production from which this production was derived

name: AssemblyExtendedProduction
comment: Defines a production of an "extended" grammar
